医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
古老谷物有望治疗 2 型糖尿病《营养、代谢和心血管疾病》杂志上的一项荟萃​​分析发现，燕麦、糙米和小米等古老谷物可能会改善 2 型糖尿病患者的血脂状况，但研究设计的变化需要进一步的研究来证实这些益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/Ancient-grains-show-promise-for-type-2-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/Ancient-grains-show-promise-for-type-2-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=806660f2-91f8-43d9-be41-5d87c0dfaf73 Mon, 29 Apr 2024 00:00:00 -0400 Ancient grains show promise for type 2 diabetes
研究质疑糖尿病管理中内型特异性饮食的必要性研究发现，不同糖尿病内型的饮食依从性及其对心血管和肾脏结局的影响存在微小差异，这表明针对内型特定饮食指南的证据有限。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240428/Study-questions-the-need-for-endotype-specific-diets-in-diabetes-management.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240428/Study-questions-the-need-for-endotype-specific-diets-in-diabetes-management.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=12753ac1-3043-4281-b089-f7fb38f19b65 Sun, 28 Apr 2024 23:45:00 -0400 Study questions the need for endotype-specific diets in diabetes management
研究表明，用于消费的肉类中存在高水平的抗生素耐药性在西班牙巴塞罗那举行的 ESCMID 全球大会（原 ECCMID）（4 月 27 日至 30 日）上发表的新研究发现，供人类和动物食用的肉类中对极其重要的抗生素存在大量耐药性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240428/Study-reveals-high-levels-of-antibiotic-resistance-in-meat-sold-for-conspiration.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240428/Study-reveals-high-levels-of-antibiotic-resistance-in-meat-sold-for-conspiration.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=95b5fda9-ffe1-4391-a1fa-2b3403cf073f Sun, 28 Apr 2024 23:28:05 -0400 Study reveals high levels of antibiotic resistance in meat sold for consumption
专家警告脊髓灰质炎和其他肠道病毒造成的持续危险持续的高疫苗接种率和全球健康监测计划帮助世界上几乎所有国家消除了脊髓灰质炎（除阿富汗和巴基斯坦外）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240428/Expert-warns-of-the-Continous-dangers-pose-by-polio-and-other-enteroviruses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240428/Expert-warns-of-the-continuous-dangers-pose-by-polio-and-other-enteroviruses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fd032731-f2c4-4c54-8a3f-04f38a322272 Sun, 28 Apr 2024 23:26:19 -0400 Expert warns of the continuous dangers posed by polio and other enteroviruses
新研究揭示内脏利什曼病的全球风险分布宣布在 Zoonoses 杂志上发表新文章。内脏利什曼病（VL）是一种媒介传播的疾病，日益引起公众健康关注。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240428/New-study-reveals-global-risk-distribution-of-visceral-leishmaniasis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240428/New-study-reveals-global-risk-distribution-of-visceral-leishmaniasis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7fef9ee4-34a5-49d0-b92c-a98d37789e46 Sun, 28 Apr 2024 23:13:00 -0400
《国际卫生条例》缔约国在就一揽子修正案达成一致方面迈出了重要一步《国际卫生条例》修正案工作组 (WGIHR) 第八次会议于昨天暂停至 5 月 16 日，在该会议上，《国际卫生条例》缔约国在就将提交给《国际卫生条例》的一揽子修正案达成一致方面迈出了重要一步。世界卫生大会于 5 月 27 日至 6 月 1 日举行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240428/State-Parties-to-the-International-Health-Regulations-take-major-step-towards-agreeing-on-the-package-of-amendments。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240428/State-Parties-to-the-International-Health-Regulations-take-major-step-towards-agreeing-on-the-package-of-amendments。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=65b196e9-b52e-4c18-9f86-bb7248007260 Sun, 28 Apr 2024 23:07:45 -0400 State Parties to the International Health Regulations take major step towards agreeing on the package of amendments
研究重新思考提高疫苗有效性的免疫系统策略最近的《细胞》杂志评论探讨了关键的免疫学假设，以增强我们对疫苗设计、自身免疫反应和免疫系统病理学的理解，旨在完善免疫学的干预策略和理论框架。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240428/Study-rethinks-immune-system-strategies-to-boost-vaccine-effectness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240428/Study-rethinks-immune-system-strategies-to-boost-vaccine- effectiveness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e5e46f1c-affb-4f66-a74e-82dd56924f05 Sun, 28 Apr 2024 22:52:00 -0400 Study rethinks immune system strategies to boost vaccine effectiveness
研究将退伍军人的长期健康风险与烧坑暴露联系起来研究表明，在有露天烧伤坑的军事基地长期部署会增加退伍军人患呼吸系统和心血管疾病的风险，包括慢性阻塞性肺病、哮喘和高血压。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240428/Study-links-long-term-health-risks-with-burn-pit-exposure-in-military-veterans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240428/Study-links-long-term-health-risks-with-burn-pit-exposure-in-military-veterans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ae01a2ae-a0e9-4376-bd13-0db8a02be728 Sun, 28 Apr 2024 22:37:00 -0400 Study links long-term health risks with burn pit exposure in military veterans
富含抗氧化剂的饮食与患有痤疮的年轻女性改善生活质量有关《营养》杂志上发表的一项研究发现，高饮食抗氧化质量指数 (DAQI) 可以通过降低痤疮严重程度和相关抑郁风险，显着提高患有寻常痤疮的年轻女性的生活质量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240428/Antioxidant-rich-diets-linked-to-better-life-quality-in-young-women-with-acne.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240428/Antioxidant-rich-diets-linked-to-better-life-quality-in-young-women-with-acne.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f5db84e1-dd24-487d-94de-1c7da625da6d Sun, 28 Apr 2024 22:23:00 -0400 Antioxidant-rich diets linked to better life quality in young women with acne
身体形象认知如何塑造年轻健身爱好者的健康习惯西班牙马德里欧洲大学的一项研究表明，力量训练项目中年轻人的负面身体形象认知可能与不良健康结果相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240428/How-body-image-perceptions-shape-health-habits-in-young-fitness-enthusiasts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240428/How-body-image-perceptions-shape-health-habits-in-young-fitness-enthusiasts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=72c50f52-c8d2-464b-8818-c40a7db72079 Sun, 28 Apr 2024 20:48:00 -0400 How body image perceptions shape health habits in young fitness enthusiasts
